title: I proclaime from the lord of hosts the returne of the Jewes from their captivity, and the building of the temple in glory, and in their owne land.
author: Tany, Thomas, fl. 1649-1655.
publisher: Printed by Charles Sumptner for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black-spread-Eagle, at the West-end of Paules,
notes: Signed at end: Theauraviohn Tany [i.e. Thomas Tany].
Annotation on Thomason copy (Thomason 669.f.17[3]): "may 1653 it came not sooner to hand".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
